member.name: IExecuteCommandHost.GetUIMode
member.summary: Enables an -based Shell verb handler to query the UI mode of the host component from which the application was invoked.

param.name: pUIMode
param.para: The application is running in the desktop environment.
The application is running in the Windows 8 immersive environment.
The application is running in the system launcher environment.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IExecuteCommandHost
member.summary: Provides a method that enables an -based Shell verb handler to query the UI mode of the host component from which the application was invoked.
